That's a great choice! The Alchemist is a wonderful book. Here are some tips for staying motivated to exercise regularly:

1. Find activities you enjoy: Experiment with different types of exercise until you find something you enjoy. For example, you could try dancing, swimming, hiking or biking. 2. Set realistic goals: Start with small, achievable goals to build momentum and increase your confidence. 3. Create a schedule: Schedule your workouts in your calendar and treat them as important appointments that can’t be missed. 4. Find a workout buddy: Having a friend or partner to workout with can be a great source of motivation. 5. Join a class: Joining a fitness class can provide structure and accountability and can also be a fun way to meet new people. 6. Track your progress: Use a fitness tracker or app to monitor your progress and celebrate milestones along the way. 7. Mix it up: Mix up your routine by trying new exercises, routines, or locations to keep things fresh and interesting. Remember, the key to staying motivated is to make exercise a habit. Once it becomes part of your routine, it will be easier to stick with it even when things get busy or stressful.
